lines.text: I'm very, very aware... that you are seeing other agents. And I think it's good that you are. Finally, I mean it's healthy. But, this is the thing. If you decide to sign with me, you're gonna get more than an agent. You're gonna get three people.

You're gonna get an agent, a mother, a father, a shoulder to cry on, someone who knows this business inside and out. And if anyone ever tries to cross you, I'll grab them by the balls and squeeze 'til they're dead.
I want you to be my friend again.
Nick, I was always your friend.
No, I know. I, I mean, I wanna be your friend again.
It's this stupid movie. It's called "Coffins from Hell."
We're doing a picture in London right now and everyone is just freaking out.
I don't know you. I don't know your work. But I think you are a genius. And I am never wrong about that.
